name: GetBlogAuthors
description:
Retrieve the list of blog authors.

Use this tool to get a list of blog authors for integration, with support for paging and filtering. Useful for examining authors to suggest edits via external services.

parameters.name: created_at_exact_time
parameters.description: Return blog authors created at exactly the specified time. Use ISO 8601 format for timestamps.

value_schema.description: Only return Blog Authors created at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: created_after
parameters.description: Return only blog authors created after this specified timestamp.

value_schema.description: Only return Blog Authors created after the specified time.

parameters.name: filter_by_creation_before_date
parameters.description: Return Blog Authors created before the specified date and time in ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Only return Blog Authors created before the specified time.

parameters.name: updated_at_timestamp
parameters.description: Return blog authors last updated at the specified exact time (ISO 8601 format).

value_schema.description: Only return Blog Authors last updated at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: filter_by_updated_after
parameters.description: Return Blog Authors updated after a specific time. Use an ISO 8601 datetime string, e.g., '2023-01-01T00:00:00Z'.

value_schema.description: Only return Blog Authors last updated after the specified time.

parameters.name: filter_by_last_updated_before
parameters.description: Only return blog authors last updated before the specified timestamp. Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ.

value_schema.description: Only return Blog Authors last updated before the specified time.

parameters.name: sort_fields
parameters.description: Fields for sorting results. Choose from: `name`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`. Default is `createdAt`.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields to use for sorting results. Valid fields are `name`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`. `createdAt` will be used by default.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor_token
parameters.description: The cursor token from `paging.next.after` to fetch the next set of results.

value_schema.description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: result_limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of blog authors to return. Default is 100.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 100.

parameters.name: included_properties
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of specific properties to include in the response for each author. If empty, all properties will be fetched by default.

parameters.name: include_archived_authors
parameters.description: Specify `true` to include archived (deleted) blog authors in the results. Defaults to `false`.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to return deleted Blog Authors. Defaults to `false`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: createdAt
parameters.description: Only return Blog Authors created at exactly the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Blog Authors created at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: createdAfter
parameters.description: Only return Blog Authors created after the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Blog Authors created after the specified time.

parameters.name: createdBefore
parameters.description: Only return Blog Authors created before the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Blog Authors created before the specified time.

parameters.name: updatedAt
parameters.description: Only return Blog Authors last updated at exactly the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Blog Authors last updated at exactly the specified time.

parameters.name: updatedAfter
parameters.description: Only return Blog Authors last updated after the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Blog Authors last updated after the specified time.

parameters.name: updatedBefore
parameters.description: Only return Blog Authors last updated before the specified time.

value_schema.description: Only return Blog Authors last updated before the specified time.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Specifies which fields to use for sorting results. Valid fields are `name`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`. `createdAt` will be used by default.

value_schema.description: Specifies which fields to use for sorting results. Valid fields are `name`, `createdAt`, `updatedAt`, `createdBy`, `updatedBy`. `createdAt` will be used by default.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

value_schema.description: The cursor token value to get the next set of results. You can get this from the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 100.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default is 100.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Specifies whether to return deleted Blog Authors. Defaults to `false`.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to return deleted Blog Authors. Defaults to `false`.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
